description: This file contains Polymer framework's micro version, including core class definitions, feature registration, and rendering status management, primarily for web component creation.

classes.name: Polymer.Base
classes.description: Core class providing lifecycle callbacks, property management, behavior handling, and feature registration for Polymer elements.

classes.name: Polymer.DomModule
classes.description: Represents a DOM module for defining custom elements and their templates.

methods.name: resolve
methods.description: Removes the 'unresolved' attribute from the document body to signal readiness.

methods.name: Settings
methods.description: Determines Polymer configuration based on URL parameters and environment capabilities.

methods.name: registerCallback
methods.description: Registers lifecycle callbacks for Polymer elements.

methods.name: createdCallback
methods.description: Initialization logic when a Polymer element is created.

methods.name: attachedCallback
methods.description: Logic executed when a Polymer element is attached to the DOM.

methods.name: detachedCallback
methods.description: Logic executed when a Polymer element is detached from the DOM.

methods.name: attributeChangedCallback
methods.description: Handles attribute changes on Polymer elements.
